channel.title: [317] help please
channel.description: Ok i got the co-ords for barrows and it works but there's no chest and when you dig and open grave they drop barrows parts. Anyone know how i can change that and add the chest? and make it so u can get items from it? please and thank you.

item.title: [317] help please
item.dc:creator: @Purely_Pink Purely Pink
item.description:
@Purely_Pink wrote:

Just add it under an existing case. You have to figure out how you want it to work depending on how the players get items from it.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] help please
item.dc:creator: @doup22 doup22
item.description:
@doup22 wrote:

where do i add the id then and how do i set it for the items in it or is that set already?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] help please
item.dc:creator: @Purely_Pink Purely Pink
item.description:
@Purely_Pink wrote:

Get the ID for the chest, make a case for it (if the chest’s Id was xxxx, it’d be

case xxxx:

From there on, you need to decide whether you want a killcount, or you want it to just go in order (kill all the barrows NPCs and then you can open it,) or one of them drops a key. That’s up to you.

Read full topic
